<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/file/{fileId}/sendeditornotify"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sends a message to the users who are mentioned in the file with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fileId","in":"path","description":"The file ID of the mention message.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The mention message.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"actionLink":{"type":"object","properties":{"action":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"string","description":"The action data that will be scrolled to.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"The action type.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The information about the action in the document that will be scrolled to.","title":"ActionConfig"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The config parameter which contains the information about the action in the document that will be scrolled to.","title":"ActionLinkConfig"},"emails":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"A list of emails which will receive the mention message.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"message":{"type":"string","description":"The comment message.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The mention message parameters.","title":"MentionMessageWrapper"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of access rights information","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the user the document will be shared with.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"permissions":{"type":"string","description":"The access rights for the user with the name above.\r\nCan be \"Full Access\", \"Read Only\", or \"Deny Access\".","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"isLink":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether to change the user icon to the link icon.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The information about the settings which allow to share the document with other users.","title":"AceShortWrapper"}},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"AceShortWrapperArrayWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
